Portrait miniature on ivory

Brief description

Portrait miniature on ivory by James Scouler depicting David Garrick and his wife. Great Britain, 1768.

Physical description

Portrait miniature on ivory depicting David Garrick and his wife.

Dimensions

Height: 146mm

Width: 114mm

Dimensions taken from Summary Catalogue of Miniatures in the Victoria and Albert Museum, Emmett Microform, 1981.Marks and inscriptions

Signed and dated 1768
